div.div: This evening, Gov. Dunleavy announced that he is extending the statewide school closure through May 1 in a continued effort to promote social distancing and keep all Alaskans safe.
The Hoonah City School District values the input of our families. Please review the following options for the 2020-21 calendar, and share your preference using the survey on this page.
div.a: Read More about School Calendar Survey

div.div: This letter is to update you on the changing situation regarding COVID-19 and plans the District is putting in place to help slow the spread of this virus in our community and maintain student learning as this situation develops.
div.a: Read More about Superintendent COVID-19 Update

a.title: Teacher inservice. No school for students
a.span: Teacher inservice. No school for students

li.a: Click here to choose elective courses

span.style: font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;;font-size: 18px;

p.span: Hoonah City School is a Trauma-Sensitive School.

span.style: font-size: large; background-color: transparent; font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: We strive to ensure that all students feel safe, welcomed, and supported. Working to mitigate trauma’s impact on learning is at the center of our educational mission. Hoonah City Schools is a place where an ongoing, inquiry-based process allows for teamwork, coordination, creativity, and sharing of responsibility for all students, and where continuous learning is for educators as well as students.

span.span: To deliver a quality education that inspires and challenges all students to reach their full potential.

br.br: Is for our students to enjoy a diverse learning environment that integrates Tlingit language and culture, engages our community, and graduates productive citizens who are healthy, self confident, creative, adaptable, and resilient.

span.style: font-variant: small-caps; font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; font-size: 13px;
